'''Alpha v1.0.10'''<ref>{{ytl|5GoKanrNkiE|Minecraft - Fancy door tutorial|hipjipp|July 22, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on July 22, 2010, which added initial support for [[multiplayer]].<ref>[[wordofnotch:846133399|First over-the-internet test of Survival Mode Multiplayer]] – The Word of Notch, July 22, 2010</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* The only server is [[Mojang]]'s [[server]].
** Accessible through a private invite only.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''General'''
* Changed button "Single player" on the title screen to "Singleplayer".
* Changed button "Multi player" on the title screen to "Multiplayer".
* Removed the "Change location" and "Load location" settings in the controls menu.</onlyinclude>

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Graphical glitch with mob in spawner block.
* When the player dies, the death screen now displays "Score: &e0". This bug remained in the game until [[Java Edition Beta 1.9 Prerelease 2]] and [[Java Edition 1.0.0]].
